#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& svr=GetRaftServer();
  Log_info("processing put command with id %d on server %d", oid, svr.site_id_);
  Log_info("the key is %s, the value is %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term;
  svr.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(!is_leader || svr.IsDisconnected()){
    Log_info("server %d is not the leader", svr.site_id_);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Log_info("done checking");
  auto s=make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t ret_term;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd(s);
  Log_info("the operation is %s", ((MultiStringMarshallable*)(cmd.get()))->data_[1].c_str());
  bool status = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &ret_term);
  auto proxies=svr.commo()->rpc_par_proxies_[0];
  size_t size=proxies.size();
  Log_info("the size is %d", size);
  if(status && size>=3){
    uint32_t time=0;
    while(svr.commit_index<index){
      Coroutine::Sleep(1000);
      time+=1;
      if(time>=5000 && svr.commit_index<index){


        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& svr=GetRaftServer();
  Log_info("processing append command with id %d on server %d", oid, svr.site_id_);
  Log_info("the key is %s, the value is %s", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term;
  svr.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(!is_leader || svr.IsDisconnected()){
    Log_info("append failed, server %d is not the leader", svr.site_id_);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s=make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t ret_term;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd(s);
  bool status = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &ret_term);
  if(status){
    uint32_t time=0;
    while(svr.commit_index<index){
      Coroutine::Sleep(1000);
      time+=1;
      if(time>=5000 && svr.commit_index<index){


        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& svr=GetRaftServer();
  Log_info("processing get command with id %d on server %d", oid, svr.site_id_);
  bool is_leader;
  uint64_t term;
  svr.GetState(&is_leader, &term);
  if(!is_leader || svr.IsDisconnected()){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s=make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(v)));
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t ret_term;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd(s);
  bool status = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &ret_term);
  auto proxies=svr.commo()->rpc_par_proxies_[0];
  size_t size=proxies.size();
  Log_info("the size is %d", size);
  if(status && size>=3){
    uint32_t time=0;
    while(svr.commit_index<index){
      Coroutine::Sleep(1000);
      time+=1;
      if(time>=5000 && svr.commit_index<index){
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
      }
    }
    string value=kvstore_[k];
    *v=value;
    Log_info("the returned string is %s", (*v).c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  string op=v->data_[1];
  Log_info("the next command to be applied is %s, id: %s", op.c_str(), v->data_[0].c_str());
  if(op.compare("get")==0){
    Log_info("applying the get command");
    // string key=v->data_[2];
    // string ptr=v->data_[3];
    // stringstream ss(ptr);
    // intptr_t p;
    // ss >> p;
    // string *ret=(string*)p;
    // string value=kvstore_[key];
    // *ret=value;
    // Log_info("the returned string is %s", (*ret).c_str());
  }
  else if(op.compare("put")==0){
    Log_info("applying the put command");
    string key=v->data_[2];
    string value=v->data_[3];
    kvstore_[key]=value;
    Log_info("the value stored for key %s is %s", key.c_str(), kvstore_[key].c_str());
  }
  else if(op.compare("append")==0){
    Log_info("applying the append command");
    string key=v->data_[2];
    string arg=v->data_[3];
    
    if(kvstore_.count(key)==0){
      kvstore_[key]=arg;
    }
    else{
      string value=kvstore_[key];
      value+=arg;
      kvstore_[key]=value;
    }
    Log_info("the value stored for key %s is %s", key.c_str(), kvstore_[key].c_str());
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
